definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage

pinyin: xin1 chan3 pin3 tui1 jie4 hui4

sentences.english: It is an ideal introduction to his music. MBe
sentences.chinese: 這是對他的音樂的最理想的推介。

sentences.english: After this presentation, we'll have lunch, which is served in the main conference hall.
sentences.chinese: 推介會之後，我們喫午飯，午飯在大會廳內。

sentences.english: The promotion event brought new business opportunities to Sichuan.
sentences.chinese: 這次推介會爲四川省帶來了新的商機。

sentences.english: Passports are intended for foreign governments through diplomatic channels by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
sentences.chinese: 護照由外交部通過外交途徑向外國政府推介。

sentences.english: Wang Guangming, deputy secretary-general of the Hunan Provincial People's Government, presides over the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 推介會由湖南省政府副祕書長王光明主持。

sentences.english: W: We have over fifty specials today.
sentences.chinese: 我們今天有五十多個特色推介。

sentences.english: The latest product for recommendation is the 18 Days Victoria Falls Tour.
sentences.chinese: 最新的產品推介爲18天的維多利亞大瀑布遊。

sentences.english: Professor Hsiao highly recommended this book and provided detailed annotation on its organization and style.
sentences.chinese: 蕭先生鄭重推介此書，且逐詞評說其章法體例。

sentences.english: User can recommend good places for taking photos.
sentences.chinese: 用戶可推介值得一去的拍照地點給網友們。

sentences.english: Where is the best place to find products to promote?
sentences.chinese: 去哪裏找產品來推介最好？

sentences.english: We have a summary of the pitches below.
sentences.chinese: 下面是這些公司的產品推介的一個總結。

sentences.english: Which country's wines presentation do you like to attend?
sentences.chinese: 您最想參加的哪個國家的葡萄酒推介會？

sentences.english: The meeting introduced Zhuhai's tourist products and the tourist investment environment.
sentences.chinese: 推介會介紹了珠海的旅遊產品和旅遊技資環境。

sentences.english: It's one of the first things we show prospective tenants.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們要向潛在租客推介之首要好處之一。

sentences.english: Recommendation of the latest music trend and interviews of musicians.
sentences.chinese: 專題性地推介最新的音樂資訊，及音樂人訪問。

sentences.english: EXAMPLE: The new product was introduced with a high-profiled advertising campaign.
sentences.chinese: 這種新產品通過一場大張旗鼓的廣告攻勢來推介。

definition: to display and sell (e.g. at a fair)/sales exhibition
to disseminate/to give publicity to/propaganda/CL:個|个[ge4]
to exhibit as broadcast/to show (on TV)
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
(abbr. for 對外宣傳|对外宣传[dui4 wai4 xuan1 chuan2]) (one's own) international public relations efforts/(another nation's) external propaganda
to exhibit at or take part in a trade show etc
to seek investment or funding/investment promotion
to reveal/to display/to show/to exhibit sth
to make a pilgrimage (to visit a holy site)/to go on a sightseeing tour
